object.script:
function onTick() scale = input.getNumber(1) centralX = input.getNumber(2) centralY = input.getNumber(3) end
function onDraw() --w = screen.getWidth() -- Get the screen's width and height --h = screen.getHeight() --screen.setColor(0, 255, 0) -- Set draw color to green --screen.drawCircleF(w / 2, h / 2, 30) -- Draw a 30px radius circle in the center of the screen screen.drawMap(centralX, centralY, scale) end
